typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Flight#} as string,
		Origin as string,
		Dest as string,
		FlightDate as string,
		NoSalesReason as string,
		TransmittingFlightAttd as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> RimDataset
RimDataset derive(CountNoValidReason = locate(NoSalesReason,'Other')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['WithDerivedColumn'],
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> targetDataSet
